trans-unit.source: Downloads the policy file that an instance of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> class will use.
trans-unit.target: 下載原則檔的執行個體<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>類別將會使用。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.HttpPolicyDownloaderProtocol"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Net.Sockets.HttpPolicyDownloaderProtocol"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The URI where the application is hosted.
The IP address where the app will run.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式執行所在的 IP 位址。

trans-unit.source: Abort the download of the policy file.
Begin the download of the policy file.
A callback function used to provide critical security actions.
trans-unit.target: 回呼函式用來提供重要的安全性動作。

trans-unit.source: The download callback function to receive the results.
trans-unit.target: 若要接收結果下載回呼函式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> to receive the results when the asynchronous operation completes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IAsyncResult>非同步作業完成時接收結果。</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: The read callback function to read the policy file.
trans-unit.target: 若要讀取的原則檔讀取的回呼函式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> to receive the results when the asynchronous operation completes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IAsyncResult>非同步作業完成時接收結果。</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Registers an object to creates an unsafe <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> to a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI).
trans-unit.target: 暫存器的物件建立 unsafe<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>統一資源識別元 (URI)。</xref:System.Net.WebRequest>

trans-unit.source: The object to create an unsafe <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>.
Gets the result of the download of the socket policy file.
trans-unit.target: 取得通訊端原則檔案下載的結果。

trans-unit.source: The socket policy file that was downloaded.
